collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (7 total Queries, 7 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `products`.*, `brands`.`name` as `brand`, `categories`.`name` as `category`, `subcategories`.`name` as `subcategory`, `capacities`.`value` as `capacity`, `compressor_warranties`.`value` as `compressor_warranty`, `sparepart_warranties`.`value` as `sparepart_warranty` FROM `products` JOIN `brands` ON `products`.`brand_id` = `brands`.`id` JOIN `categories` ON `products`.`category_id` = `categories`.`id` JOIN `subcategories` ON `products`.`subcategory_id` = `subcategories`.`id` JOIN `capacities` ON `products`.`capacity_id` = `capacities`.`id` LEFT JOIN `compressor_warranties` ON `compressor_warranties`.`id` = `products`.`compressor_warranty_id` LEFT JOIN `sparepart_warranties` ON `sparepart_warranties`.`id` = `products`.`sparepart_warranty_id` LEFT JOIN `garansi_elemen_panas` ON `garansi_elemen_panas`.`id` = `products`.`garansi_elemen_panas_id` LEFT JOIN `garansi_motor` ON `garansi_motor`.`id` = `products`.`garansi_motor_id` LEFT JOIN `garansi_panel` ON `garansi_panel`.`id` = `products`.`garansi_panel_id` LEFT JOIN `garansi_semua_service` ON `garansi_semua_service`.`id` = `products`.`garansi_semua_service_id` LEFT JOIN `ukuran_tv` ON `ukuran_tv`.`id` = `products`.`ukuran_id` WHERE `products`.`id` = 110

UPDATE `product_submissions` SET `product_id` = 110, `status` = 'pending', `submitted_by` = 'Aoz0raSenpai', `brand` = 'BERVIN', `category` = 'SMALL APPLIANCES', `product_type` = 'ABCD09', `color` = 'HIJAU', `subcategory` = 'DISPENSER GALON BAWAH', `capacity` = '', `ukuran` = '', `berat` = '2', `daya` = '2', `pembuat` = 'CHINA', `refrigrant` = '', `compressor_warranty` = '2', `sparepart_warranty` = '', `garansi_elemen_panas` = '', `garansi_motor` = '', `garansi_panel` = '', `garansi_semua_service` = '', `kapasitas_air_panas` = '8', `kapasitas_air_dingin` = '7', `product_dimensions` = '2 x 2 x 2 cm', `packaging_dimensions` = '2 x 2 x 2 cm', `pstand_dimensions` = '', `panel_resolution` = '', `cooling_capacity` = '', `cspf` = '', `advantage1` = '1', `advantage2` = '2', `advantage3` = '3', `advantage4` = '', `advantage5` = '', `advantage6` = '', `gambar_depan` = '1730700690_4f5799f7a5c7ec16966b.png', `gambar_belakang` = '', `gambar_samping_kiri` = '', `gambar_samping_kanan` = '', `gambar_atas` = '', `gambar_bawah` = '', `video_produk` = '' WHERE `product_submissions`.`id` IN ('92')
